DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect total intravenous anesthesia inhalation anesthesia cancer cell cytotoxicity , micrometastasis recurrence tumor patient undergo breast tumor resection . Using propofol-remifentanil total intravenous anesthesia group sevoflurane -remifentanil inhalation anesthesia group .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effect Total Intravenous Anesthesia Inhalation Anesthesia Cancer Cell Cytotoxicity , Micrometastasis Recurrence Tumor Patients Undergoing Breast Tumor Resection
DOC.criteria: patient 20 65 age ASA physical status ⅠⅢ breast cancer patient sign local invasion ( adjacent organ ) distant metastasis reveal image study surgery perform surgical team ASA physical status Ⅳ hepatic renal impairment diabetes endocrine disorder body mass index > 35 kg/m2 immune disorder immunosuppressive therapy steroid treatment last 6 month inflammation
DOC.keyword: total intravenous anesthesia , inhalation anesthesia , cancer cell cytotoxicity , breast tumor
